titles.title: Church Plan Investment Fairness Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend to church plans the exemption from unrelated business tax for debt-financed property held by pension plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/28/2005--Introduced. Church Plan Investment Fairness Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt church retirement income accounts from the tax on unrelated debt-financed income.
